description: As influential Roman patricians, you set out to improve your garden districts. Grow bountiful gardens. Cultivate ponds rich with fish. Build lavish villas and various other dwellings for your servants. The day is yours to seize and the city ripe for rebuilding! A sophisticated and intriguing tile-laying game with high replay value thanks to its variable gameplay. This game includes 1x gameboard, 220x tiles, 150x cards, 44x wooden pieces and instructions. This game is suitable for 2-4 players. Suitable for ages 10 years and up.
